channel.title: Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Classic Sinai

item.title: Our Bodies, Our Souls
item.description: Forget the glass ceilings you are expected to exceed. Take a different route to smooth out the impossible juggling act between life, work and everyone else's expectations.
item.itunes:author: Rebbetzin Tzipora Heller

item.title: Education vs Conditioning
item.description: How to have unlimited amounts of joyful acheivement.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Motty Berger

item.title: 48 Ways - Happiness
item.description: Happiness is today's most sought after pleasure - and also the most elusive. Hear sound advice to break common unhappiness habits, regain lost optimism, and increase your energy level for a more rewarding life..
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Noah Weinberg

item.title: Marriage: How to Have a Good Fight
item.description: Rabbi Meyer gives practical marriage advice for the non-angelic. Refreshing, real and user friendly.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Yosef Chaim Meyer

item.title: Awaken Your Jewish Identity
item.description: The latest society craze is to escape the melting pot and embrace your cultural heritage - so stop opting out and discover how Jewish roots can help you build a whole new fashionable personality.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Avi Geller

item.title: Intimacy
item.description: Ditch the happy ever after fallacy and learn what it really takes to sustain a committed marriage with your own prince or princess charming.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Nachum Braverman

item.title: Wonders of the Hebrew Language
item.description: A jaw-dropping class showing you the hidden wonders of the Hebrew language and the not so obvious fingerprints of its Creator.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Shmuel Silinsky

item.title: Building Bridges With Those You Love
item.description: Giving and receiving love - this class contains many practical ways of achieving this goal that movies and pop songs never quite get around to explaining.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Noach Orlowek

item.title: Jewish Obsession with the Holocaust
item.description: Learn how the Holocaust is more than soothing survivor guilt and how it holds unusual lessons for your day-to-day lives.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Yitzchak Berkovits

item.title: Overview of the Five Books
item.description: Take a tour through God's user guide for living. Learn about a few things that really matter to the Creator of this incredibly beautiful universe.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Avi Geller

item.title: Mysticism, Meaning and Life
item.description: To what extent is it possible to make life decisions without pride or passion getting in the way? Go beyond the mask of self-interest to deepen your objectivity and discernment.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Dovid Gottlieb

item.title: Pleasure: The Ultimate Energizer
item.description: For more energy and pleasure in your life, this talk on the 5 distinct Levels of Pleasure is a must listen.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Noah Weinberg

item.title: Genesis and the Big Bang
item.description: Dr Gerald Schroeder gives a natural approach to align what the scientists claim about the Big Bang with the creation account given in the Book of Genesis.
item.itunes:author: Dr. Gerald Schroeder

item.title: The Matrix and Jewish Reality
item.description: This probing discussion on 'The Matrix' explains how the movie is an excellent representation of how Jewish philosophers have always perceived reality.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Motty Berger

item.title: World Perfect
item.description: Rabbi Spiro exposes the secret immorality of ancient civilizations and gives a surprising glimpse of where modern society really draws its existing moral lessons from.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Ken Spiro

item.title: Relationships - Part Three: Beneath the Skin
item.description: From talk shows to self-help books - everyone wants to know how to make relationships last. This lively class reveals the Jewish secret - so listen carefully.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Lawrence Kelemen

item.title: Spiritual Bodyshop
item.description: When you dent your car you take it to the shop, but where do you go to fix up your soul? Hear a down to earth talk on a viable option for spiritual repair.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Yom Tov Glaser

item.title: The Happy Wife
item.description: Aryeh Pamensky's genius story-telling and fantastic humor is guaranteed to alter your current opinion of marriage, and help you to laugh your way through all your 'marital mousetraps.'
item.itunes:author: Aryeh Pamensky

item.title: 4 Things You Never Knew About Judaism
item.description: Upgrade your Sunday School conception of what it means to be Jewish. You may be pleasantly surprised at how much Judaism can offer you in terms of personality development.
item.itunes:author: Lori Palatnik

item.title: How Does Torah Nourish Your Soul?
item.description: Have a listen to this Rabbi’s Atkins Program for the soul, and learn how a healthy spiritual diet can enlighten and brighten your entire outlook on life.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Yitzchak Berkovits

item.title: Crash Course in Jewish Holidays
item.description: Learn how each of the Jewish holidays offer a unique spiritual energy that is available for you to tap into and benefit from the whole year.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Avraham Goldhar

item.title: Crash Course in Jewish History
item.description: Even if you hated history, this fresh and humorous account from a Jewish perspective shows how relevant events of the past can help you in planning your future.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Ken Spiro

item.title: Our Bodies Our Souls II
item.description: Continuing from Rebbitzen Heller's previous class - hear her tackle more sticky issues plus explanations on other Jewish practices relevant to women.
item.itunes:author: Tziporah Hellers

item.title: Joseph: 7 Lessons in Diplomacy
item.description: Dr David Luchins, former senatorial advisor, takes a closer look at Joseph and draws out 7 lessons of diplomacy we can all use - even if we never becomes foreign ambassadors.
item.itunes:author: Dr David Luchins

item.title: Morality in the Public Eye
item.description: Has society become so open minded that its brain has fallen out? Hear how mixed up today's modern society has become in its quest for morality, and how it has left itself vulnerable to a new set of problems.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Yaakov Weinberg ztl

item.title: Real Values
item.description: Take a listen to Rabbi Beyda's great expose on the exodus from Egypt. Catch a few pearls that you may have missed at your last Passover Seder table.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Raymond Beyda
